item.title: Elasticsearch
item.description: Elasticsearch is an open-source, RESTful, distributed search and analytics engine built on Apache Lucene. Installation Elasticsearch # update your package index sudo apt-get update # Download latest version # Check version information: https://www.elastic.co/downloads/past-releases wget https://download.elastic.co/elasticsearch/release/org/elasticsearch/distribution/deb/elasticsearch/2.3.1/elasticsearch-2.3.1.deb # Install through dpkg command sudo dpkg -i elasticsearch-2.3.1.deb Installation Elasticsearch from Repository # update your system sudo apt-get update # install Java sudo apt-get install default-jre # add Elasticâ€™s signing key wget -qO - https://artifacts.
